posts.post_content:
Nice uncreased example of an 1894 Mayo's Cut Plug of Frank Butterworth.  Not sure what warranted the Authentic grade.  Wear around the edges but uncreased and a solid black back.  Butterworth was a two-time All American fullback and running back for Yale.  He later coached them to an undefeated National Championship.  $pending + $4 shipping.  Check or M.O.  

Rob M

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=365531&d=1568059770[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=365532&d=1568059777[/IMG]
Can almost guarantee that back was recolored. Still a great card!

It's hard for me to tell but you may be correct Scott because I don't see any signs of trimming.

Rob M

Price dropped to $pending + shipping.

Rob M
